channel.title: Posts on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Notes

item.description: Overview Link to heading The first three or four episodes are setting up for what existential risk is, why it matters, and what it looks like. The remaining ones cover specific types of risk. Overall, the series covers the conventional wisdom on this topic well. It doesn’t challenge, dig deep, or break new ground, but it’s fine. Background Link to heading Fermi Paradox & Drake Equation Link to heading This sets up the series, and justifies why there’s actual evidence that we are at very high risk of going extinct, i.
